panels.description: Milliseconds spent in the critical section of scheduler loop â€“ only a single scheduler can enter this loop at a time
panels.title: Scheduler Critical Section Duration (ms)

panels.description: Seconds elapsed between first task start_date and dagrun expected start
panels.title: DAG Run First Task Scheduling Delay (s)

panels.description: Count of times a scheduler process tried to get a lock on the critical section (needed to send tasks to the executor) and found it locked by another process.
panels.title: Scheduler Critical Section Busy (2m)

panels.description: Seconds of delay between the scheduled DagRun start date and the actual DagRun start date
panels.title: DAG Run Schedule Delay (s)

panels.description: Milliseconds taken to check DAG dependencies
panels.title: DAG Dependency Check (ms)

panels.description: https://airflow.apache.org/docs/apache-airflow/stable/logging-monitoring/metrics.html
panels.title: Default Pool - Open, Running, Queued, Starving; Triggers Running
Executor Open Slots, Queued Tasks, Running Tasks

panels.description:
Number of tasks running in executor
Number of tasks that cannot be scheduled because of no open slot in pool
Number of tasks that are ready for execution (set to queued) with respect to pool limits, dag concurrency, executor state, and priority.
panels.title: Airflow Scheduler Tasks Running, Starving, Executable, Killed Externally

panels.description: Seconds since <dag_file> was last processed
panels.title: DAG Processing Last Run Seconds Ago (s)

panels.description: Seconds taken to scan and import all DAG files once
panels.title: DAG Processing Total Parse Time (s)

panels.description: Number of errors from trying to parse DAG files
panels.title: DAG Processing Import Errors

panels.description: Number of DAGs found when the scheduler ran a scan based on itâ€™s configuration
panels.title: DAG Bag Size

panels.description: Number of triggers that blocked the main thread (likely due to not being fully asynchronous)
panels.title: Triggers Blocked Main Thread (2m)

panels.description: Number of tasks instances created for a given Operator
panels.title: Task Instances Created (2m)

panels.description: Number of non-zero exit code from Celery task.
panels.title: Celery Execute Command Failure (2m)

panels.description: Number of AirflowTaskTimeout errors raised when publishing Task to Celery Broker.
panels.title: Celery Task Timeout Errors (2m)

panels.description: Number of Orphaned tasks [adopted, cleared] by the Scheduler
panels.title: Orphaned Tasks Adopted, Cleared

panels.description: Number of tasks killed externally
panels.title: Tasks Killed Externally

panels.description: Number of stalled DagFileProcessorManager
panels.title: DAG Processing Manager Stalls

panels.description: Number of file processors that have been killed due to taking too long
panels.title: DAG Processor Timeouts
